summary: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force emails colleagues regarding an investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, seeking to contact a witness located in Sweden for an interview.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject in an FBI investigation involving child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject alongside Jeffrey Epstein in an FBI investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The author of the email, working on the New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force, seeking to contact a witness in Sweden for an interview.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same FBI investigation into child exploitation and human trafficking.
The FBI Special Agent is the case agent investigating Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI Special Agent is the case agent investigating Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: FBI Agent Seeks to Contact Witness in Sweden
events.description: An FBI Special Agent emails colleagues to coordinate contacting a witness in Sweden for an interview regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell for child exploitation and human trafficking as of January 2020.
A witness relevant to the investigation was located in Sweden.
The FBI case agent was seeking to establish contact with the Swedish witness for an interview.
The communication shows internal FBI coordination efforts for international witness contact.
